siminov.web.adapter

Interface IHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SiminovHandler

    public interface IHandler
    Exposes methods to deal with actual request comes from WEB-TO-NATIVE or NATIVE-TO-WEB. It has methods to open, create, close, and execute query's.
